extendedInfo.description: With the free version of the app- you can manually input coupon details, organize your coupons and get alerts when they expire. It is a digital coupon organizer. ALSO- in the premium/PAID, upgraded version you can scan bar codes to input coupons, search our coupon database by keyword and bulk import entire inserts!In the premium version you can scan your coupon bar code to input the coupon details! Our app is one of the only apps with a huge coupon database. Besides scanning barcodes we also have a keyword search option to allow you to search our coupon database AND even a bulk import option. You can select from a list of recent coupon inserts (for example SS 01/29/2012) and with one click import every coupon from that insert into your Android Phone!Plus FREE access to our website http://www.CouponScanApp.com. Use the login details you register the app with and you can see all of your in app coupons on our website. All of your data is automatically backed up to our website. You can add/edit delete coupons and sync them with your device! Remember your app username and password and simply login at http://www.CouponScanApp.com.With the Coupon Organizer & Scanner saving money is a breeze. With the free version of the app you can manually input and organize and unlimited number of coupons. Assign them to categories, input value and expiration dates and get alerts when the coupon is about to expire. You can mark coupons as "used".Using the coupon in manual mode is great- but you can also upgrade to the premium version which unlocks unlimited access to our huge coupon database, allows you to scan an unlimited number of coupons, unlimited Keyword search and imports from our database AND you get access to the bulk insert import function!Some key features of Coupon Organizer and Scanner:â¢ Receive notification alerts before your coupons expires.â¢ Set the time of day and how many days in advance to receive the notification alertâ¢ Customizable categories to match how you sort your coupons, customizable store lists and source lists as wellâ¢ Search through your coupons by name, sort by categoryâ¢ Set expiration date as well as a starting date.â¢ Ability to duplicate or clone an existing coupon.â¢ Easily navigate the different fields when entering coupon details.â¢ Expired coupons will move to the history tab automatically after a certain number of days, which can be set by the user.â¢ Sort your coupons by name, category, or expiration date.â¢ Filter coupons on a particular category.ALSO- in the Premium Version available via in-app purchase:â¢ Access to our huge coupon databaseâ¢ Unlimited Bar Code scans to quickly input coupon data into your app. Why type all the info in for the coupon name, value, insert date, expiration date etc? We do it all for you! Just scan itâ¢ Unlimited access to Keyword Search our huge coupon database and add coupons that wayâ¢ Unlimited access to our bulk coupon insert upload feature. Select a recent coupon insert, and the app will display every coupon from that insert. You can then select all or select some coupons to import.. along with all of the coupon data

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.comment: Scanner doesn\'t work.coupons not in database. Waste of money!!!! Wish I had read the reviews first. If you are going to make an app with a scanner, first of all, make the scanner work, second keep your database updated. Don\'t expect people who pay good money to do it for you! I will never use one of your apps again.
reviews.author: Marsha Morrison

reviews.title: Waste of money.
reviews.comment: Spent the 10 because I thought rhe app sounded like exactly what I needed. Doesn\'t work, can\'t scan any of my coupons, slow, and the wording is too light to see.
reviews.author: Lenora Garrett

reviews.title: Do NOT buy this app!!!!
reviews.comment: I have been trying for months to get refund. I keep writing to the developer and she always wants to try and fix but never fixed the problem which is it won\'t scan coupons even from the Sunday paper. She keeps giving me excuses how busy she is instead of refunding my $10.00 which was a little much for this app but it sounded so kool. She has not emailed me back after I\'ve emailed her several times. Now idk what to do. I highly recommened u do NOT buy this app!!!!
reviews.author: Jamie Natale

reviews.title: I want my money back please, This app doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: How do I get a refund? This app doesn\'t scan any coupons at all, I have a brand new I phone and it doesn\'t work on it. I would like my money back ASAP. I wouldn\'t have gave this app even one star but it wouldn\'t let me post without rating at least one star in my opinion this is a rip off and I think it\'s crap! Please do NOT buy this app!
reviews.author: JoJo Sherwood

reviews.title: Free app does nothing
reviews.comment: Downloading the free app makes you create an account and then everything you press says you have to buy the app for 10 bucks to do it.
reviews.author: Andrea Wersyn

reviews.title: Wasted Money
reviews.comment: I got the scanning upgrade. It is the biggest waste of money I have dealt with. The bulk importance option tells me the coupons already exist and they are nowhere in my account. The scanner doesn\'t work and the app doesn\'t recognize the few the scanner does catch. I can\'t believe they charge 10 dollars for an app that doesn\'t work at all! This app is highway robbery!
reviews.author: Morgan Petro

reviews.title: scanner should be free
reviews.comment: I know so many people who would use this app if you didn\'t have to pay for it. I understand that you need to make money, but maybe instead offer a free version with ads. The whole purpose of using coupons is to save money, so it kinda defeats the purpose if you are charging $10 for an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Just Saved You $10...
reviews.comment: ...Which is more than this app can. I took a chance & purchased the upgrade. DON\'T BOTHER. It\'s a waste of time, space & most importantly $$$. It doesn\'t work as advertised: doesn\'t scan new DataBar barcodes, can\'t set alerts for expiring coupons, coupon database is virtually non-existent and can\'t edit entries correctly. There is no support for app-FAQ/website are worthless & devs are unresponsive to emails. It\'s a shame since this app had a lot potential to be really helpful. Thanks for nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: IPhone app only??
reviews.comment: I\'m trying to load coupons on my HTC rezound and the barcode looks so small in the upper left corner.went to help and it says its for iPhone only??? Why is it here then..if not, how do you get this thing to work properly? I paid $9.99 and can\'t use it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time
reviews.comment: This app is horrid.  I paid for the full version...don\'t do it.  The website you get access to is a blank Wordpress install...database is useless....unless someone puts what insert coupon is in...in other field you don\'t know.  Can\'t get the scan to work.  Asked for a refund via email immediately and have not heard back at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Google Should Pull
reviews.comment: This is terrible.  Scan doesn\'t work - menu is blocked by header.  No coupons in database - the only one I found put the wrong data in the fields (cat food not dog food).  Editing the data is close to impossible, since you cannot even read what is typed in because the font is too light.  If you do perform data entry, doesn\'t save.  Unusable in landscape mode - you can\'t see what you\'re typing. I feel like my money was stolen!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: pointless
reviews.comment: It is pointless to download the free version...you can\'t do anything.  I am not willing to pay $10 to try this app out.
reviews.author: Lalo Ruiz

reviews.title: very disapointing
reviews.comment: Whats the point of a free version if it doesnt even work...im sure you would make a lot more money offerring a full version that works for cheaper...i wouldve happily paid up to $5 to use it..especially if the free version worked. I bet if you lower your price on the full version and make the free version actually do what it says it does, you would make alot more...more downloads equals more money for you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is Great
reviews.comment: I really love this app.  It does have some things that can be improved upon, but it is worth it.  To be honest the fact it has a bulk importer and a coupon look up makes it not even really need a scanner, but each to their own.  I have a Samsung Galaxy S3 so I am having a hard time figuring out how to \"use\" a coupon from my phone, however I can go on the web side and make the adjustments.    With that said this app makes couponing so much easier!  I work full time and go to school (on top of being a mom of 3 active kids) so this is a life saver.  No more fumbling with a binder or having to update lists.  I know what I got within seconds so it also cuts my shopping trip because I even set up the categories to match up the ones I set up in my coupon binder.  SIMPLE!  I work in retail and recommend this app on a daily basis
reviews.author: Geri Chamberlin

reviews.title: Scanner doesnt work
reviews.comment: When it does read a coupon, it isnt in the system. A complete waste!   \'
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t listen to the haters
reviews.comment: If you\'re getting turned down when you use this app, well, you\'re just not trying hard enough. As any half-decent couponer knows, you\'re the customer, and you\'re always right: demand the discount. I\'ve had stores tell me they can\'t take Android phone coupons, but just tell them to try, and if there\'s a barcode it always works.
reviews.author: Rashedul Islam

reviews.title: White/light grey text on white background
reviews.comment: Even with poor reviews I went ahead and gave this app a try (the free version), it\'s simply unusable. With white/light grey text on white background, I can\'t tell if I\'m entering the text correctly. After squinting and putting my tablet nearly up to my nose; I think I finished entering all the data I could see that it needed then tapped save, it loaded another screen and coupon seems to not have saved, aggravating. Plus I hate apps that force portrait mode, now uninstalling.
reviews.author: Meu Biscuit

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Entered my coupons 3x on free version, not saving them. I would have bought the Pro version but the free one doesn\'t even work. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate it !
reviews.comment: This app is no good. it doesn\'t recognize any of the coupons I try to scan.... wasted 10 bucks
reviews.author: Kelly Leblanc

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This is a horrible app! First of all you have to enter all coupons...they will not scan and if they do it comes up not in the system...If I had wanted to enter all upc codes I would have gone with one of the FREE apps......I just wasted $9.99!!!!! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY on this one. I just wish I had read the reviews first...
reviews.author: Cher Grant
